ERC20Burnable","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"distributor","type":"address"},{"internalType":"bool","name":"authorized","type":"bool"}],"name":"setAuthorizedDistributor","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint24","name":"newFee","type":"uint24"}],"name":"setPoolFee","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"newRecipient","type":"address"}],"name":"setProtocolFeeRecipient","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"swapRouter","outputs":[{"internalType":"contract ISwapRouter","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"totalRunBurned","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"newOwner","type":"address"}],"name":"transferOwnership","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"stateMutability":"payable","type":"receive"}],"devdoc":{"details":"Implements the v2 Virtuals Protocol fee split (40/40/20):      When `distribute()` is called:        1. 40% \u2192 Swap ETH for $RUN via Uniswap V3, then BURN (atomic, on-chain)        2. 40% \u2192 Credit to the agent's token treasury (pull pattern)        3. 20% \u2192 Credit to the protocol fee recipient (pull pattern)      The $RUN buyback-and-burn is atomic because:        - It's a protocol-level deflationary mechanic that must be trustless        - No reliance on external keepers or bots to execute the burn        - The swap + burn happens in a single transaction      The agent treasury and protocol fee use pull pattern because:        - Different agents have different treasury addresses        - A failed claim by one agent shouldn't block others        - Gas cost is distributed to claimers, not the distributor      ETH flow: ETH \u2192 WETH (wrap) \u2192 Uniswap swap \u2192 $RUN \u2192 burn()      The WETH wrapping is necessary because Uniswap V3's exactInputSingle      operates on ERC-20 tokens, not native ETH.","errors":{"OwnableInvalidOwner(address)":[{"details":"The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)"}],"OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address)":[{"details":"The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation."}],"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}]},"events":{"BuybackExecuted(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"distributionId":"The distribution ID this buyback belongs to","ethSpent":"The ETH amount swapped for $RUN","runBurned":"The $RUN amount received from Uniswap and burned"}},"DistributorUpdated(address,bool)":{"params":{"authorized":"Whether the distributor is now authorized","distributor":"The distributor address"}},"ETHClaimed(address,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The ETH amount claimed","recipient":"The address that claimed"}},"FeesDistributed(uint256,address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"agentTreasury":"The agent treasury receiving the 40% agent allocation","amountAgent":"ETH credited to agent treasury (claimable via pull)","amountBuyback":"ETH used for the $RUN buyback-and-burn swap","amountProtocol":"ETH credited to protocol fee recipient (claimable via pull)","distributionId":"Unique sequential ID for this distribution"}},"PoolFeeUpdated(uint24,uint24)":{"params":{"newFee":"The new pool fee","oldFee":"The previous pool fee"}},"ProtocolFeeRecipientUpdated(address,address)":{"params":{"newRecipient":"The new protocol fee recipient","oldRecipient":"The previous protocol fee recipient"}},"RunBurned(uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The $RUN amount burned in this transaction"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"claimETH()":{"details":"Uses checks-effects-interactions: zeroes balance before transfer."},"constructor":{"params":{"_poolFee":"The Uniswap V3 pool fee tier for the WETH/$RUN pair","_protocolFeeRecipient":"The protocol fee recipient (receives 20%)","_runToken":"The $RUN token contract address","_swapRouter":"The Uniswap V3 SwapRouter address on Base"}},"distribute(address,uint256)":{"details":"Performs the 40/40/20 split:      - 40% buyback: ETH -> WETH -> Uniswap swap -> $RUN -> burn (atomic)      - 40% agent: credited to agentTreasury (claimable via claimETH)      - 20% protocol: credited to protocolFeeRecipient (claimable via claimETH)      Agent treasury gets remainder after buyback + protocol to absorb rounding dust.","params":{"agentTreasury":"The agent's treasury address receiving the 40% growth allocation","minRunOut":"Minimum $RUN tokens to receive from the swap (slippage protection)"}},"getClaimable(address)":{"params":{"recipient":"The address to check"},"returns":{"ethAmount":"The claimable ETH amount"}},"getDistributionCount()":{"returns":{"_0":"The distribution count"}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"setAuthorizedDistributor(address,bool)":{"params":{"authorized":"Whether to grant or revoke distribution rights","distributor":"The address to authorize or revoke"}},"setPoolFee(uint24)":{"params":{"newFee":"The new pool fee (e.g., 3000 for 0.30%)"}},"setProtocolFeeRecipient(address)":{"params":{"newRecipient":"The new protocol fee recipient address"}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). (1.00%)"}},"title":"FeeSplitter","version":1},"userdoc":{"errors":{"ETHTransferFailed()":[{"notice":"Thrown when an ETH transfer fails during claim"}],"InvalidPoolFee()":[{"notice":"Thrown when an when a distributor's authorization status changes"},"ETHClaimed(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a recipient claims their accumulated ETH"},"FeesDistributed(uint256,address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when fees are distributed across the three channels"},"PoolFeeUpdated(uint24,uint24)":{"notice":"Emitted when the claimETH().details: Uses checks-effects-interactions: zeroes balance before transfer.

params._poolFee: The Uniswap V3 pool fee tier for the WETH/$RUN pair
params._swapRouter: The Uniswap V3 SwapRouter address on Base

distribute(address,uint256).details: Performs the 40/40/20 split:      - 40% buyback: ETH -> WETH -> Uniswap swap -> $RUN -> burn (atomic)      - 40% agent: credited to agentTreasury (claimable via claimETH)      - 20% protocol: credited to protocolFeeRecipient (claimable via claimETH)      Agent treasury gets remainder after buyback + protocol to absorb rounding dust.

params.agentTreasury: The agent's treasury address receiving the 40% growth allocation
params.minRunOut: Minimum $RUN tokens to receive from the swap (slippage protection)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.authorized: Whether to grant or revoke distribution rights
params.distributor: The address to authorize or revoke

params.newRecipient: The new protocol fee recipient address

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

SPLIT_AGENT_BPS().notice: Agent token treasury allocation in basis points (40%)

SPLIT_PROTOCOL_BPS().notice: Protocol fee allocation in basis points (20%)

WETH().notice: Canonical WETH address on Base L2

authorizedDistributors(address).notice: Set of addresses authorized to call distribute()

claimETH().notice: Claim all accumulated ETH for the caller

constructor.notice: Initialize the FeeSplitter with protocol addresses

distribute(address,uint256).notice: Distribute ETH fees: atomic $RUN buyback-and-burn + pull-pattern allocations

getClaimable(address).notice: Get the claimable ETH balance for a recipient

getDistributionCount().notice: Get the total number of distribution events

poolFee().notice: The Uniswap V3 pool fee tier for the WETH/$RUN pair

setAuthorizedDistributor(address,bool).notice: Authorize or revoke a distributor address

setPoolFee(uint24).notice: Update the Uniswap V3 pool fee tier

setProtocolFeeRecipient(address).notice: Update the protocol fee recipient address

swapRouter().notice: The Uniswap V3 SwapRouter contract on Base
